stops.description: A string of pipe(|) separated stops. Each stop can be either an address or a set of coordinates. Stop modifiers can be added before any address separated by a colon(;)
examples: type:origin;1676 40th Street, Calgary, AB|235 Heritage Drive, Calgary, AB|3368 Heritage Drive, Calgary, AB|1956 Fourth Avenue, Calgary, AB|type:destination;785 7th Ave, Calgary, AB
